item.name: Get Vehicle by model and year

response.name: Audi A3 2015

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Keep-Alive
header.description: Custom header

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

header.name: X-RateLimit-Limit
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-RateLimit-Remaining
header.description: Custom header
